summary: A new bow mod which shares the textures of the Bound Bow spell. This is my first ever mod, and turned out well, in my opinion!
descriptionHtml:
The Bow of The Depleter is a mod which adds a new bow to your game: 'Bow of the Depleter'.
The Bow of the Depleter is, depending on the target, usually a 1 hit kill, and if not, provides Shock damage, Fire damage and Frost damage. The mod adds a new enchantment, also!
If you do not want the OP power of the Bow of the Depleter, then you may disenchant the bow and take the enchantment!

The bow can be found in a chest. The chest may be found in Dragonsreach, in Whiterun.
The chest is locked, and requires a key! The carrier of the key is a man named Leighvarr, who's only purpose is to carry the key to the chest. Leighvarr also carries 25000 gold, and the chest contains 25000 gold, also! If you do not want to, you do not have to take ALL the gold, take some as a reward for pickpocketing Leighvarr!

This is my very first mod, so please, be kind!
author: Dizoole K Ska
